availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Laurel County farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Permilia White Black (Jones) in 1846. Children (siblings): John C. Jones, William E. Jones, Lucinda C Jones Mildred B Jones Jarvis C Jones Mary Jones and Clarsa Jones. Farmer in 1850 census. Farmer in 1860 census.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, [City/District], p. 420
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, [City/District], p. 14A
Find A Grave, "Hiram J. Jones 1824-1905," Memorial # 25657533, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25657533/hiram-james-jones (accessed [April 4th, 2018]).
